targets.expr: count(100 - (avg by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{eosinstance="$instance", role="storage", mode="idle"}[1m])) * 100)>90) or vector(0)
avg(node_time_seconds{job="node", eosinstance="$instance", role="storage"} - node_boot_time_seconds{job="node", eosinstance="$instance", role="storage"}) > 20736000 or vector(0)
avg(node_time_seconds{job="node", eosinstance="$instance", role="storage"} - node_boot_time_seconds{job="node", eosinstance="$instance", role="storage"})

panels.description:
duration of simple namespace-only operations (eos mkdir, eos rmdir, eos touch, eos rm), in sec.
negative value: command returned an error.
panels.title: Namespace latency

targets.expr: node_time_seconds{job="node", eosinstance="$instance", role="storage"} - node_boot_time_seconds{job="node", eosinstance="$instance", role="storage"}
